pages.text: The first important thing is a lapis lazuli block. It must be placed under the table, $(o)seems like some sort of catalyst$().$(br) Next is an iron ring embedded with amethyst. When working on a resonance table it should be equipped all the time.$(br2) Finally, put all the ingredients on the table and throw a bottle of experience to finish it.
$(o)But where can I get the charms recipes?
